[[טַעַם]], and As. šanê ṭêmi, madness); [[וַיְשַׁנֶּהָ]] Es 2:9, i.e. changed her place [[לְטוֹב בֵּית הַנׇּשִׁים]]; 1 s. Ps 89:35 the utterance of my lips I will not change (‖[[לאׁ אֲחַלֵּל בְּרִיתִי ]]); Inf. cstr. [[לְשַׁנּוֹת אֶת־דַּרְכֵךְ]] Je 2:36 i.e. change thy political course; [[בְּשַׁנּוֹתוֹ אֶת־ טַעְמוֹ]] Ps 34:1 (title; cf. 1Sa 21:14 supr.); Pt. [[מְשַׁנֶּה פָנׇיו]] Job 14:20 altering his face, i.e. in death (subj. God).
